query.statement:
SELECT X.CHK, X.FLAG, X.DEP, X.CDT, X.RDT, X.SEQ, X.SIR, X.DPT, X.DPT_NM, X.TEM, X.TEM_NM, X.PSN, X.PSN_NM, X.GBN, X.GBN_NM, X.GNM, X.SPT, X.QTY, X.EAM, X.OAM, X.RAT, X.MON, X.ADR, X.PID, X.P01, X.P02, X.P03, X.P04, X.G01, X.G02, X.G03, X.G04, X.PST, X.PST_NM, X.MNO, X.SNO, X.RNO, X.YDT, X.IDT, X.ACB, X.JRT, X.JRT_NM, X.DEL FROM ( SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, A.BS401_DEP DEP, A.BS401_CDT CDT, A.BS401_RDT RDT, A.BS401_SEQ SEQ, A.BS401_SIR SIR, A.BS401_DPT DPT, B.CTEXT2 DPT_NM, A.BS401_TEM TEM, C.CTEXT2 TEM_NM, A.BS401_PSN PSN, F.USERNAME PSN_NM, A.BS401_GBN GBN, E.CTEXT2 GBN_NM, A.BS401_GNM GNM, A.BS401_SPT SPT, A.BS401_QTY QTY, A.BS401_EAM EAM, A.BS401_OAM OAM, TRIM(CHAR(A.BS401_RAT)) || '%' RAT, A.BS401_MON MON, A.BS401_AD1 || ' ' || BS401_AD2 ADR, A.BS401_PID PID, TRIM(CHAR(A.BS401_P01)) || '%' P01, TRIM(CHAR(A.BS401_P02)) || '%' P02, TRIM(CHAR(A.BS401_P03)) || '%' P03, TRIM(CHAR(A.BS401_P04)) || '%' P04, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = 'ko' AND CODE1 = 'BS406' AND CODE2 = A.BS401_G01) G01, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = 'ko' AND CODE1 = 'BS406' AND CODE2 = A.BS401_G02) G02, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = 'ko' AND CODE1 = 'BS406' AND CODE2 = A.BS401_G03) G03, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = 'ko' AND CODE1 = 'BS406' AND CODE2 = A.BS401_G04) G04, A.BS401_PST PST, CASE WHEN A.BS401_DEL = 'Y' THEN 'ªË¡¶' ELSE D.CTEXT2 END PST_NM, A.BS401_RDT || '-' || A.BS401_SEQ MNO, A.BS401_AYM || '-' || A.BS401_ASQ SNO, ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.BS401_RDT, A.BS401_SEQ ORDER BY A.BS401_RDT, A.BS401_SEQ, A.BS401_SIR DESC) RNO, A.BS401_YDT YDT, A.BS401_IDT IDT, A.BS401_ACB ACB, VALUE(G.JRT,'') JRT, VALUE(G.JRT_NM,'') JRT_NM, A.BS401_DEL DEL FROM SAPHEE.ZBST401 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AA.BS407_DEP, AA.BS407_RDT, AA.BS407_SEQ, AA.BS407_SIR, AA.BS407_JRT JRT, BB.CTEXT2 JRT_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZBST407 AA, SAPHEE.ZLCODE BB WHERE AA.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND AA.MANDT = BB.MANDT AND AA.BS407_JRT = BB.CODE2 AND BB.LANG = 'ko' AND BB.CODE1 = 'BS103' ) G ON G.BS407_DEP = A.BS401_DEP AND G.BS407_RDT = A.BS401_RDT AND G.BS407_SEQ = A.BS401_SEQ AND G.BS407_SIR = A.BS401_SIR, SAPHEE.ZLCODE B, SAPHEE.ZLCODE C, SAPHEE.ZLCODE D, SAPHEE.ZLCODE E, SAPHEE.ZUSERF F WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.BS401_DPT = B.CODE2 AND B.CODE1 = 'VKBUR' AND B.LANG = 'ko' AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.BS401_TEM = C.CODE2 AND C.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND C.LANG = 'ko' AND A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.BS401_PST = D.CODE2 AND D.CODE1 = 'BS407' AND D.LANG = 'ko' AND A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.BS401_GBN = E.CODE2 AND E.CODE1 = 'BS402' AND E.LANG = 'ko' AND A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.BS401_PSN = F.USERNUMB AND A.BS401_CDT BETWEEN #FDT# AND #TDT#
AND A.BS401_DPT = #DPT#
AND A.BS401_TEM = #TEM#
AND A.BS401_PSN = #PSN#
AND A.BS401_PST IN ('25','35')
AND A.BS401_PST = #PST#
AND A.BS401_GBN = #GBN#
AND A.BS401_RDT = #MRT#
AND A.BS401_SEQ = #MSQ#
AND A.BS401_AGB = #AGB#
AND A.BS401_DEL = 'N' ) X WHERE X.RNO = 1 ORDER BY X.DEP, X.RDT, X.SEQ, X.SIR WITH UR
